name: Conqueror's Haki
text: #Counter Give up to 1 of your Character or your [Silvers Rayleigh]+2000 power during this battle. Then, you may rest 1 of your DON!! cards. If you did, give all of your opponent's Characters and Leader -1000 power during this turn.
